title: Cortana Extensions
body:
A way to create the Voice Command Definition (VCD.xml) for Cortana using C#. Currently here: https://github.com/WilliamABradley/CortanaExtensions
It was inspired by NotificationExtensions, where you can create the Cortana VCD.xml using C# instead of figuring out how to define the XML yourself.
This can be really helpful if you want to easily create a Multi-Lingual Cortana Experience, if you use RESW. As well as a RESW File Code Generator (Or RESX), and a tool like the MultiLingual Toolkit.
